src/app/app.component.ts.content: import { Component, ViewEncapsulation, ViewChild } from "@angular/core"; import { SwiperComponent } from "swiper/angular"; // import required modules import { EffectFlip, Pagination, Navigation } from "swiper"; @Component({ selector: "app-swiper-example", template: ` `, styleUrls: ["./app.components.scss"], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, }) export class AppComponent { modules = [EffectFlip, Pagination, Navigation]; }
